name: SeekingSanta-AChristmasAdventure
0:
”Alexa, open Seeking Santa”
”Alexa, start Seeking Santa”
”Alexa, launch Seeking Santa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seeking santa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Strap in and hold tight for a Christmas adventure like no other. Santa’s vanished, his arch enemy Krampus is plotting to ruin the festive fun and only one person can save the day, you. 

Help Head Elf Bernard and his assistant solve a fun filled daily challenge in the 12 days before Christmas to make sure you stay on the nice list. 

Join us from the thirteenth of December as you travel the world by reindeer in order to keep Christmas on track. Help solve the daily challenges and there might still be hope, get them wrong and Christmas is cancelled. 

See you on the thirteenth of December.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
